archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1397
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
Related to: - Feature_20: Mobile Addon - Feature_24: Mobile - Add-on - Extra Data - minutes - MVNO - Feature_27: Mobile - Carry-over Data
As a customer I want to cancel a recurring "Extra Data" and/or "Extra Minutes" add-on on an existing subscription. I can specify when to cancel the add-on.

properties.value: Assumed that cancelation is for recurring add ons, so from the next period add will be not generated for a customer, correct?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
